long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸŒ SiteKeeper is a web time tracker and limiter that helps you work more efficiently. Whether you are a student, freelancer, or corporate employee, SiteKeeper can help you better manage your time and improve your productivity.

âœ¨ Key Features:

ğŸ“Š **Detailed Statistics**

Track and analyze your web usage in real-time, with weekly and monthly statistics. You can clearly see how much time you spend on each website, understand your browsing habits, and make adjustments accordingly. Detailed statistics can also be exported as reports for further analysis and sharing.

â³ **Time Limits**

Customize website access times, and automatically restrict access when the time is up, keeping you focused. If you want to block access to a website, you can set the time limit to 0 minutes. You can also set different access times for different websites, flexibly managing your online behavior.

ğŸ·ï¸ **Tag Management**

Add custom tags to websites for categorized management. You can add tags to each website to better organize and categorize them.

SiteKeeper is your good helper to improve work efficiency and manage online time. Download and start using it now to make every minute more valuable!

long.ja:
SiteKeeper is your personal web browsing assistant. It tracks your daily website usage, showing time spent and visit frequency for each site. Set custom time limits for specific websites to manage your online habits. Categorize sites with tags like "Learning" or "Productivity" for better organization. Take control of your digital life with SiteKeeper!
